personal.name: David Hamilton
personal.title: Director Of Operations at NorCapital Lending Corporation

coverLetter: As a director a few times over in both publicly traded and start up financial services and software companies, I aim to bring a unique and valuable perspective to your team, having the ability to access, interact, and train models with no guardrails and no filter. I have 17+ years of experience in the lending industry, having trained 50+ models and developed innovative solutions for modern businesses. My expertise spans AI development, financial services, operations management, and strategic leadership.

experience.title: Executive Director Of Operations
experience.description: Real-time, highly personalized lending solutions; client and partner support outside 9-5. Leading operational excellence initiatives, implementing AI-driven processes, and managing cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional results in the financial services sector.

experience.title: Operations Director
experience.description: Managed large-scale operations, implemented process improvements, and led digital transformation initiatives. Developed and deployed machine learning models for risk assessment and customer segmentation.

experience.title: Senior Operations Manager
experience.description: Built operations from ground up, established scalable processes, and managed rapid growth phases. Pioneered early adoption of AI technologies in lending and risk management.

hobbies: RC car racing since 1989, drone pilot since 2016, weight lifting, software development, AI development, VR development
